definition[0]: flimsy cloth or clothing is light and thin
definition[1]: something that is flimsy is not strong or well-made, and will break easily
definition[2]: a flimsy agreement is weak and can easily be damaged or broken
example[2]: a flimsy alliance between the two tribal groups
definition[3]: a flimsy argument or excuse does not seem very likely and people do not believe it
example[3]: The evidence against him is extremely flimsy.
